text:
Hi team!

I need to create a calculated property that aggregates the sum from another field, for example: I have two different records that have the same field, and these two records have a value property, I need to sum this value, aggregating by this equal field, the only way I can imagine this being done is through Python code, but the code is not running correctly, has anyone gone through this and know where to go?
Does anyone have an example of how to do this
